H0.text: Who won the first ever boxing gold for women? She shares her surname with two US Presidents.. Mary Adams

H1.text: Who won the first ever boxing gold for women? She shares her surname with two US Presidents.. Abigail Adams

H2.text: Who won the first ever boxing gold for women? She shares her surname with two US Presidents.. Louisa Adams

H3.text: Who won the first ever boxing gold for women? She shares her surname with two US Presidents.. Nicola Adams

A4.text: She went on to defeat Chinese boxer and world number one Ren Cancan in the final to claim the first Olympic women's boxing gold medal.

A5.text: As an amateur, she became the first female boxer to become an Olympic champion after winning gold at London 2012, and the first double Olympic champion following a second gold medal at Rio 2016.
